name: BoxChums 2
description:
Welcome to BoxChums 2 - The Temple of Light!

BoxChums 2 is a puzzling sequel involving boxes, mirrors,  vines, and lasers! (don't worry, they're perfectly safe) Solve various puzzles using techniques learned along the way, and in the process, embark on an exciting adventure!

I recommend playing the original first, but it's not necessary

Controls:

  • X to start
  • Arrow keys to move
  • Z to undo (everyone make mistakes!)
  • R to restart

Features:

  • Even more puzzling levels
  • Five hidden secrets and a coded message
  • An all new soundtrack! Check it out here:
    • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GfMLXX-n6hw

created in PuzzleScript.
